verbs.description: [ARG0: israeli court] [V: hears] [ARG1: us student appeal against detention an american graduate student who has been held in detention while fighting an expulsion order over her involvement in the boycott movement against israel appeared in court on thursday asking a judge to allow her to enter the country to begin her studies graduate student ben - gurion airport israel israeli court gilad erdan hebrew university palestine tel aviv lara alqasem]

israeli court hears us student appeal against detention an american graduate student who [V: has] been held in detention while fighting an expulsion order over her involvement in the boycott movement against israel appeared in court on thursday asking a judge to allow her to enter the country to begin her studies graduate student ben - gurion airport israel israeli court gilad erdan hebrew university palestine tel aviv lara alqasem
